item.title: Basic White Bloomer
item.description: Ingredients Ingredient Subheading 4 cups (500g) strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting 2 tsp salt 2 tsp dried yeast 3 tbsp olive oil 10 oz (320ml) cool water (1.25 cups) Directions Tip the flour into a large mixing bowl and add the salt to one side of the bowl and the yeast to the other. Add the oil and 240ml of the water. Use the fingers of one hand to mix the ingredients together.
